original_text: I am here as your servant to lead the people that you have chosen for yourself. It is a great nation and it has too many people to count.
korean_text: 왕께서 택하신 백성 가운데 있나이다 그들은 큰 백성이라 수효가 많아서 셀 수도 없고 기록할 수도 없사오니

sentences.original_text: I am here as your servant
that you have chosen for yourself
and it has too many people to count
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 셀 수 없이 많은 백성을 가지고 있습니다
